text: I had a great experience at Well-Balanced Family Chiropractic with Dr. Yen Ee. She is professional, attentive, and truly cares about her patients' well-being. The treatment was thorough and tailored to my specific needs. I noticed a significant improvement in my posture and overall comfort after just a few sessions. The clinic has a welcoming atmosphere, and the staff is friendly and helpful. I highly recommend Dr. Yen Ee to anyone looking for effective and personalized chiropractic care.

I’ve been receiving chiropractic treatment from Dr. Jason for the past few months, and the improvements have been amazing. Before starting treatment, I often had headaches and even felt breathless at times, along with pain in my neck and back. He adjusted my posture, which made a big difference. Since then, all of these issues have gotten much better. He’s very friendly, professional, and always careful during treatment. I appreciate how he takes the time to explain everything and ensures I’m comfortable throughout the process. I feel much better now ！

Been visiting this clinic for about 4 months for my chronic shoulder, lower back and knee pains! Significant progress has been made and allows me to return to a more active lifestyle without pain. As someone who is new to chiro, it has been a great experience and value for money. Highly recommend if you are looking for a clinic in the east as the location is near the MRT.

Both Dr Yen Ee and Dr Jason are very friendly and good at providing care, along with the lovely clinic staff Chie and Clai as well. It is very easy to schedule appointments using their online system or WhatsApp.

I’ve had a great experience at well-balance clinic. Dr yee has been amazing in helping me improve my posture and alleviate back discomfort.

She not only adjusted my back but also provided me with tailored exercises to strengthen my muscles and maintain proper alignment.

I can already feel the difference, and her personalized care and guidance make all the difference. Highly recommend!"

I have been seeing Dr. Jason for a few months now, and I cannot say enough good things about him. From my very first appointment, he took the time to listen to my concerns, explained everything clearly, and created a personalized treatment plan that is actually working. My lower back pain has significantly improved, and I feel more mobile and energetic than I have in months.

The office is clean and welcoming, and the staff, Clai and Chie, are always friendly and professional. Appointments start on time, and the entire experience is stress-free.

If you are looking for a knowledgeable, compassionate, and skilled chiropractor, I absolutely recommend Dr. Jason.
